data.meta_description: What is it about paint? Starting at Jackson Pollock's Blue Poles join this special tour focused on the ubiquitous medium of paint. Free. This Friday at 12pm.…
data.text: Essential Tips for Art Maintenance ✨ The most important thing to do after buying your art is keeping it in a good condition. If it’s worth buying, then it’s worth keeping, don’t you think? The great Mona Lisa is over five hundred years old; you see, the Starry Night by Van Gogh has been around for over a century. Yes, the artists did a great job, but care and healthy preservation make art live longer. Whether you have an expensive piece or a not-so-expensive piece, here are tips on how to care for your art. Learn more here - https://lnkd.in/e8uK6Aaw #art #artwork #maintenance #monalisa #artists #preserve #worthy #artmaintenance #essentialtips
